column2: an A.M. Eatery////The pancakes are very delicious. they brought a free one to us
column3: but don't go in expecting to get that. we just got water spilled on us so. and they really liked us. Good food
column4: cool atmosphere. atrocious line before. pricey. like a diner on steroids but the brunch is beautiful and flavorful so. noisy
column5: but good music selection -a collaborative effort review
